message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to me. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $9,000 is a good starting point, I'm hoping we can find a price that's a bit closer to my initial offer.  How about $10,500? This would be a fair compromise that acknowledges the value of the product.
I understand you're looking for a compromise, but $10,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10,000. Can we meet at $10,000?
